name: Maid CL34N
description:
As the newest cleaning robot MAID CL34N your job is cleaning any house that needs it!

Armed with your broom bubble shooter, destroy and clean every bacteria over the 12 levels

Controls:

W/A/S/D - Move

Arrow Keys - Shoot

Z - Check

Made with Game Maker Studio 1.4

Music:

Operatic 3 by Vibe Mountain

Wehrmut by Godmode

From the free Youtube Music Library

SFX:

Kenney Assets

ChipTone

Audacity
